author: JetMETdqmval
body:
monitor substructure variables in JetMET DQM for ak8 jets. update PFJetID Selector to new recommended RunII JetID, move type1 corrections to ak4CHS JetEnergyCorrector. 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11539 (original by @JetMETdqmval).
title: update PFJetID for RunII, add ak8 MiniAOD monitoring, adopt ak4CHS JEC for type1 MET
